name: Py-ts3api
tagline: An attempt of a TeamSpeak 3 server API implemented in Python.
body:
### Welcome to the project's page.
I'm attempting to develop a API for the [TeamSpeak 3 Server](http://www.teamspeak.com/?page=teamspeak3) using the ServerQuery it provides via telnet, implementing it in Python 3.

And yes, I am aware that this has been done already and it's even on GitHub but I'm doing this as a practice project and maybe I'll get to use it later on my own server. 

### Disclaimer
I'm a computer science student and I'm still learning so my code might not be the best you can find. You shouldn't use this code while I'm still at it, it's going to be bad for a while.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
